content: (ANY)Steam credits/games/DLCs for saleCurrent budget: 40eurThe current budget is the amount I have in my Steam wallet right now which is available at this moment for buying you gift cards or games.How does this work?- You send me a message on what you need from the Steam store and if I accept the order, I will send the price (Actual price of the product) in Bitcoin via PM. When the transaction gets confirmations I buy the product(s) and send them to you via the Steam Trade function (or if it is a Steam key, via PM on this forum).If all goes well, I will leave a positive trust on your profile.Escrow?- If you need an escrow for safety reasons, that is accepted if the escrow fee is paid by the customer. Only high ranked escrows and I buy once they confirm the funds so I do not potentially waste my funds.Higher budget?- As I am using this service for buying Bitcoin from customers, I will deposit more funds if necessary. Feel free to message me about products that exceed the current budget.Altcoins?- If you have altcoins (Ethereum XRP or similar), please mention it in message so I can see if it is possible to exchange.You can order by PM or in the thread!Cheers!
